desc: Handmade artisan chocolates infused with Indian flavors and spices. Hundred percent Belgian chocolate. Our six flavors are- Saffron, Chai, Rose, Coconut Jaggery, Orange Clove and Pistachio Kulfi. Unique Gift ideas for Diwali, Christmas, Birthday, Wedding Favors and Party Favors. Made in Michigan.

layout.text: Handmade artisan chocolates infused with Indian flavors and spices.
